name: Sony PULSE 3D Headphone
desc: Headphones provide a personalized audio experience with over-ear and in-ear options. Sleek designs, noise cancellation, and Bluetooth add convenience, making them essential for music and gaming on the go.

name: Apple Watch Series 6
desc: The Apple Watch Series 6 offers advanced health and fitness features, a stunning Retina display, and seamless integration with your iPhone.

name: Amazon Echo 3rd Gen
desc: Encapsulates the essence of our revolutionary audio innovation. Resonating bass with unparalleled clarity, redefining your auditory experience.
